description: bowmo, Inc. provides an intelligent software solution for staffing and recruiting industries. The company offers V-RPO platform, a combination of proprietary AI-based technology, which automates the process with its AI-based matching engine and provides industry-superior tools, such as video interviewing, cultural, and technical assessments. It also provides managed recruiting as a service, which allows clients to outsource the management of the recruiting process. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
